Welcome to Remote Triggered Vertical Plotter’s documentation and help page !¶

Remote Triggered Vertical Plotter is a project undertaken by a team of students under the expert guidance of Prof Pruthviraj Umesh and Center of System Design, NITK Surathkal

This project is inspired by the idea of horizontal plotters for if we can build a horizontal plotter, then why not a vertical plotter ?
